description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have:

• 5+ years of experience with React, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript frameworks
• Strong proficiency in building scalable web applications
• Experience with Node.js and RESTful APIs
• Familiarity with TailwindCSS and modern CSS frameworks
• Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS preferred)
• Experience with Git and version control
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail

Responsibilities:
• Design and develop new features for our web platform
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions
• Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
• Optimize application performance and scalability
• Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices

Bonus Skills:
• Experience with GraphQL
• Knowledge of Docker and containerization
• Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines
• Open source contributions
